short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fully customizable Google extension to notify you to rest your eyes every 20 minutes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rest your eyes with helpful reminders from notifications and sound alerts, fully customizable!
Prevent eye strain by following the 20 20 20 rule! every 20 minutes extension shows a notification to look at something 20 meters away for 20 seconds. All times and sounds are fully customizable.
This extension is great for anyone that spends long periods behind a screen.
Your eyes will thank you:)
